description.value: You are part mortal and part deity, and you might have been originally born fully mortal. Choose a mortal species. Your Creature Type, Size, and Speed are the same as the species you choose. However, you still aren't quite a member of your mortal species, even if you were born as one. You don't gain any of the other traits of that species, and you can't select feats that have your mortal species as a prerequisite, unless you first take the @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-ancestries-demigods.feat-dnd5e.Item.6wOEUZ5mQM4bxhOD]{Mortal Roots} demigod species feat.
